message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $115. It's a great opportunity to get a high-quality item at a reasonable price.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm really interested in the product, but $115 is a bit high for my budget. Would you consider $105?
I appreciate your interest in our product, Bob. After considering your offer, I've decided to counter with $110. This is the best price I can offer given the value of the product.
